title: Honor Badge Problem
body: I currently have the Teamwork badge. However, at least 5 times now the window has popped up saying that I have earned the Honorable Opponent badge, but when I go in game, I still have the Teamwork badge. Is there something I can do about this? I would much prefer the Honorable Opponent badge.

replies.body:
No.

It displays the rarest Badge.

Contact help and support or make a post addressed to Riot if you feel the wish to discuss it or have a request.
